title: Radiance
body: The Intention: Radiance is a journey into the body through daily practice and nutrition.
This journey intends to share nutritional wisdom that nourishes the body's natural beauty through daily spiritual practices coupled with medicinal foods.
Each day we will do a meditation practice and add in certain foods that rejuvenates our natural state.
There are no dietary restrictions to this journey.
Beauty in this journey is defined as expressing our authentic selves in a body that is made to shine naturally.

The human body radiates a natural beauty when it is nourished well. Physical beauty is a result of proper nourishment. Feeling good in the body manifests a youthful look of glowing skin, healthy hair, nails, and fluid joints.
With the addition of minerals, healthy oils, and medicinal foods, we can cultivate peace within that brings a natural state of radiance.
